name: Category Archives Block
author: TipTopPress

sections.description:
Displays a archive of posts for one or more specific categories in the Gutenberg block editor. It can be configured to either show by month or year with post counts and as a listing or a pulldown.

Tip Top Press

We’re Tip Top Press and create Gutenberg Blocks for WordPress. If you want to know about what we’re working on and you are interested in backgrounds then you can read all newes storys on our blog.

Features

  • Option multi category selection
  • Option group by month or year
  • Option to either show a listing or a pulldown
  • Option show post counts
  • Option to order
  • Option for spacing, color and typography

Contribute

While using this plugin if you find any bug or any conflict, please submit an issue at Github (If possible with a pull request).
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/category-archive-block directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.faq:
How is the Cateogry Archives Block different than the built-in Archive widget?

The Category Archives Block lets you show posts for one or more specific categories. The built-in Archive widget shows posts for all categories.
